channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- eVision Responsive Column Layout Shortcodes
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- eVision Responsive Column Layout Shortcodes

item.title: CVE-2023-0064|2023-03-06T13:34:06.078Z -- unknown -- evision%20responsive%20column%20layout%20shortcodes
item.description: The eVision Responsive Column Layout Shortcodes WordPress plugin through 2.3 does not validate and escape some of its shortcode attributes before outputting them back in a page/post where the shortcode is embed, which could allow users with the contributor role and above to perform Stored Cross-Site Scripting attacks.
